00233 template <class ViewBase>
00234 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetZoomToFit(bool state)
00235 {
00236        if (state != m_isZoomToFit){
00237               m_isZoomToFit = state;
00238               ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00239               if (m_isZoomToFit){
00240                      m_storedTransform = view.GetTransform();
00241                      UpdateComponentsPosition();
00242                      view.UpdateFitTransform();
00243               }
00244               else{
00245                      UpdateComponentsPosition();
00246                      view.SetTransform(m_storedTransform);
00247               }
00248               UpdateButtonsState();
00249        }
00250 }
00251 
00252 
00253 template <class ViewBase>
00254 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetFitMode(FitMode mode)
00255 {
00256        if (m_fitMode != mode){
00257               m_fitMode = mode;
00258               ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00259               view.UpdateFitTransform();
00260               if (m_isZoomToFit){
00261                      UpdateComponentsPosition();
00262               }
00263        }
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 template <class ViewBase>
00268 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetGridVisible(bool state)
00269 {
00270        ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00271        view.SetGridVisible(state);
00272 }
00273 
00274 
00275 template <class ViewBase>
00276 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetRulerVisible(bool state)
00277 {
00278        if (state != m_isRulerVisible){
00279               m_isRulerVisible = state;
00280               UpdateComponentsPosition();
00281               UpdateButtonsState();
00282        }
00283 }
00284 
00285 
00286 template <class ViewBase>
00287 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetGridInMm(bool state)
00288 {
00289        ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00290 
00291        if (state != view.IsGridInMm()){
00292               view.SetGridInMm(state);
00293               UpdateButtonsState();
00294        }
00295 }

00471 template <class ViewBase>
00472 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::UpdateView()
00473 {
00474        ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00475        if (m_isZoomToFit){
00476               m_storedTransform = view.GetTransform();
00477               UpdateComponentsPosition();
00478               view.UpdateFitTransform();
00479        }
00480 
00481        view.Update();
00482 }

00487 template <class ViewBase>
00488 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::Init()
00489 {
00490        m_isButtonsPanelVisible = true;
00491        m_isButtonsPanelVertical = false;
00492        m_areScollbarsVisible = true;
00493        m_areZoomsVisible = true;
00494        m_isZoomToFitVisible = true;
00495        m_arePolylineButtonsVisible = true;
00496        m_areUserModeButtonsVisible = false;
00497        m_isStatusVisible = true;
00498        m_isStatusButtonVisible = true;
00499        m_isScrollbarsButtonVisible = true;
00500        m_isGridButtonVisible = true;
00501        m_isRulerButtonVisible = true;
00502        m_isRulerVisible = false;
00503        m_isMmButtonVisible = true;
00504        m_isUndoButtonVisible = true;
00505 
00506        m_isPixelPositionVisible = true;
00507        m_isPixelValueVisible = true;
00508        m_isMmPositionVisible = false;
00509 
00510        m_isBkActive = false;
00511        m_isZoomToFit = false;
00512        m_fitMode = FM_BOTH;
00513 }
